top: Each project is a work of art.
We believe in high quality at an honest price.
Having worked all over the world, we now supervise bathroom renovations throughout the Netherlands and Flanders.
bottom: Alexander Paul was born out of a passion for designing and building unique bathrooms.
Our goal is to take building to the next level, viewing each project as a new work of art that we help our clients design and build.
We work as much as possible with natural materials to create a relaxed and luxurious atmosphere.
